name: Whacky Packs
description:
You’ve been invited to spend your Christmas Holidays in the biggest parcel delivery in town. You really need the money and the job is easy to do. Using the highest scanning technology your job is to identify what’s in the parcel and accept or decline. A breathtaking task, friendly costumers and a really chilled boss await you in this amazing vacation job.

Scan the parcels, they said. It’s gonna be fun, they said!

Assets used: 

Workplace Tools | 3D Industrial | Unity Asset Store

Rusty plane | 3D Air | Unity Asset Store

HQ Laptop Computer | 3D Electronics | Unity Asset Store

Camera HQ | 3D Electronics | Unity Asset Store

Toilet(PBR) | 3D Furniture | Unity Asset Store

PBR Cardboard Box | 3D Props | Unity Asset Store

Free Sci-Fi Office Pack | 3D Sci-Fi | Unity Asset Store

Low-Poly Retro City Car 03 | 3D Land | Unity Asset Store

8K Skybox Pack Free | 2D Sky | Unity Asset Store
